_description: ‘De initio creacionis ordinis sancte Trinitas’ — fifty-nine couplets

BLEge3143.First Lines:
Almighty lord In magesteÞat was and ys and ay sall
                    be…
BLEge3143.Last Lines:
…To god þat he þaim saue & sendTo myrth þat
                    neuer mare sall haue end. Explicit
